sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Fix script to upgrade Monetory / Non-Monetory Benefit Plans related for San Diego</description> <name>BenefitRealizationSDUpgrade</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var start = new GlideDateTime(); gs.log("Starting of BenefitRealizationSDUpgrade , time : "+start); var upgradeHelper = new BenefitRealizationSDUpgradeHelper(); upgradeHelper.updateLabelsOnBenefitPlan(); upgradeHelper.makeAssociatedBenefitFieldEditableOnBenefitPlan(); var end = new GlideDateTime(); gs.log("Ending of BenefitRealizationSDUpgrade , time : "+end); gs.log("Total time taken for BenefitRealizationSDUpgrade in millisecs : "+(end.getNumericValue() - start.getNumericValue()));]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-09-06 06:47:46</sys_created_on> <sys_id>d27e76ef531230103913ddeeff7b12c3</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>BenefitRealizationSDUpgrade</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="PPM Standard" source="com.snc.financial_planning_pmo">92ef82e747e64210cd4e1ce4316d43e3</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_d27e76ef531230103913ddeeff7b12c3</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-09-23 17:55:34</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
